abstract: A live look at Game 2 of the World Series in St. Louis.
snippet: A live look at Game 2 of the World Series in St. Louis.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS -- The Texas Rangers forced the St. Louis Cardinals to go deep into their bullpen again and hit two sacrifice flies in the ninth inning to rally for a 2-1 victory in Game 2 of the World Series on Thursday night at Busch Stadium.
